ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure

Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.Comment

  • public class Comment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents Comments that readers add to a story. It is part of the model of the application. Comments are left by users on pages and are therefore aggregated by the Page class. Comments are serialized with the rest of the story into JSON to be stored by a handler.
    Author:
    James Moore, James Cadek
